name: Soft’Lit Naturally Luminous Hydrating Longwear Foundation
about: What it is: A hydrating and glowy foundation that's waterproof and reduces shine for a notch above natural finish..Coverage: Medium.Finish: Natural.Formulation: Liquid..What Else You Need to Know: This is a long-wearing, medium-coverage foundation that gives golden-hour glow in a bottle. It hydrates, brightens, and improves the look of skin tone immediately and over time, while resisting sweat, humidity, and transfer....Allure
ingredients: Aqua/Water/Eau, Dimethicone, Butylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Diphenylsiloxy Phenyl Trimethicone, Glycerin, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Cetyl Peg/Ppg-10/1 Dimethicone, Trisiloxane, Butylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Polyphenylsilsesquioxane, Magnesium Sulfate, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Caprylyl Methicone, Lauroyl Lysine, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Aluminum Hydroxide, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Isopropyl Myristate, Isostearic Acid, Lecithin, Terminalia Ferdinandiana Fruit Extract, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Cyperus Rotundus Root Extract, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Be sure to moisturize skin before applying foundation..-Always shake before use for smooth application..-For medium coverage, apply one pump of Soft Lit Foundation to the back of your hand. Dip a damp Precision Makeup Sponge 100 (sold separately) into the product and begin applying at the center of your face or wherever coverage is desired, pressing foundation into skin and blending outward..-For full coverage, apply one to two pumps of Soft Lit Foundation directly on the Foundation Brush 145 (sold separately) and blend. Add more to build your desired coverage.

reviews.review_title: And another win for Fenty! Xoxo
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very impressed. Long lasting. No weird scent. Didn't experience any skin irritations. My skin feels really soft and foundation doesn't feel weighing or drying. Didn't notice any oxidation issues. Good color match shade #420, my favorite number lol. #Fenty never disappoints.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! For like two years I've been using ILIA's True Skin foundation but when I was shade matched for that, I'm not sure I got the right color. I also didn't like the blendability of that product as well and so when the topper on my foundation broke, I decided to hunt for a new one.  I went in to a Sephora and after discussing it with a Beauty Advisor, we both agreed this might be a great option. I'm so glad I went in for a shade match and kuddos to Fenty Beauty for delivering on a shade that perfectly matched my skin. I also love the blendability and coverage. This stuff is amazing!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the formula, it’s so beautiful and hydrating. However, it is actually impossible to find the correct shade. I’ve tried Ulta’s shade match tools, Sephora’s shade match tools, and help from employees at both stores. No luck, it still doesn’t match my skin tone. It shouldn’t be that hard so I give up after 3 different attempts.

reviews.review_text: It's not a terrible foudnation but not great either and for the price, it's ridiculous. It doesn't do well with most cream contour, it wipes off when you try to blend in the contour. Used with several primers. It does transfer a bit. Good for a quick makeup and if you don't need to wear it all day.

It doesn’t really have a scent and the packaging was pretty like the whole bottle is really pretty, but it didn’t work that well for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Try this before spending big $ on Luminous Silk
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When this product first launched I was like “Ooh…we def don’t need another one of these on the market,” but after seeing it won the allure stamp for the year I decided to take notice. The finish on this is stunning. Has that ambient glow to it but also sets on the face nicely, unlike some of the other foundations in this category that either slide around all day or dry me out. Is not heavy at all on the skin at all. It straight up looks like you have nothing on but just naturally flawless skin.   One con I will say is that it takes an uncomfortably long time to get to the shade it ultimately gets to once it dries down completely. The whole time I was doing my makeup I was like, is this really not going to match me after I swatched this in-store so many times. It eventually did, but it takes AWHILE, like once you’re finished with your makeup. The shade also leans a bit more golden than I was expecting based on the photos, but I can make it work. I just might try a different, cooler shade next time.   It outperforms $70 foundations, so it’s a yes from me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used Futurust by Estee Lauder, and Armani Silk, both are wonderful. But this foundation is so richly pigmented and blends so well it is unreal.  I will be 50 in July and this foundation blends and melts into my skin like butter.  I am unsure of longevity/if it will rub off on clothes etc yet though.  I used stick sunscreen under it (Neutrogena Beach Defense) and NYX HD Studio Finishing powder lightly over top.  Then sprayed with Milano Make It Last Original Spray.Hoping it looks like this all day despite winter hats, freezing winds etc that I deal with all winter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try this as I used to love the formula of the Fenty hydrating foundation that was discontinued. Unfortunately this one is not similar - the coverage was more light than medium and I did not find it buildable without looking cakey. The worst part was it looked very dry and felt powdery on my skin. The shade match was perfect but I could not get the formula to work for me, even with hydrating skin prep before.

reviews.review_title: This is as perfect as it gets. Seriously.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a sucker for complexion products, and in 2024 I've tried out 16 different foundations. This is the first one that I legitimately have NOTHING negative to say about. The shade range is amazing, the texture is fantastic, it lays down beautifully (and stays where you put it!), wears like a dream and may be the first foundation in ages that has actually pulled off the 'skin-like finish' claim. Don't be fooled by the luminous claim...this isn't glittery or shiny or oily. Whatever magic RiRi put in this bottle is a whole new level of HG glow - haven't seen it in another complexion product. If you're in the market for an every day medium coverage foundation...make no mistake. This is as perfect as it gets.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ll start off this review by stating that I ordered the wrong color, so I wasn’t able to test this foundation out all day - my thoughts are based on swatching. The packaging for this product is heavy and luxurious feeling, which is nice and fitting for the price tag. I am used to light coverage foundations, so this was a big step up with the medium coverage! The finish is indeed luminous, and reminiscent of flawless filter. Had this been my shade, I would’ve loved it!
Beau fond de teint, lumineux, , par contre choisir pas trop foncé car s’oxyde et paraît plus jaune.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I would like to preface this by saying when selecting my shade, I got overly excited and selected the first option I saw. This shade is not the shade I need for my skin tone. With that being said I used this foundation as a contour. I have used fenty beauty products faithfully for years and even with my using the minimal amount daily for my contour I am able to see how nice the formula is. The texture is a dream and I love how it applies. I am purchasing my exact shade that I would need in the near future. Another great product Rihanna 😍✨

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It goes on smooth and does not get cakey after multiple layers, I would recommend this for combination and oily skin as it does not clog your pores or irritate your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you’re familiar with the other foundations that Fenty makes, this one is very comparable. The coverage is amazing as expected and the shade match is consistent, which I love. I hate it when the shades between lines don’t correspond. The finish is more skin-like/radiant when compared to the matte one—like a more full-coverage version of the skin tint. However, I still prefer the matte one personally because it has less transfer. Maybe I could’ve set it more, but I feel like too much powder makes things look more cakey than seamless. Overall, it’s a nice foundation but maybe more for the dry skin girlies.

reviews.review_text: This absolutely does not work for my very dry skin. Cakey and settles in pores and grabbed onto texture. I will have to return it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I went from fenty to rare beauty to fenty. It is absolutlely INSANE how natural fenty is on me. It also matches my skin like no other. Such a good product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin

I love that I got full coverage on my face. i have been using it for the past month and im in love. It’s so hard for me to find the right foundation so I’m very happy with this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried sooo many different foundations shades from in sooo many different brands trying to find a good one for my olive skin and I FINALLY found it! Foundations always look too pink, orange or gray on my skin but this one is the closest match to my actual skin tone. I'd be careful if you have dry skin though, I feel like it's a tiny bit drying but I have combination skin so it's not so bad for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation. Every time I saw someone who had nice makeup on, as their skin looked flawless, I asked what foundation they used, and more than 2-3 times they told me fenty. It’s full coverage yet feels so light on your face. Not cakey or heavy. And you only need one pump for your whole face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation feels very light on the skin and gives a beautiful glow

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fenty Beauty’s  Foundation is a standout for darker complexions, offering an impressive range of shades that cater specifically to deeper skin tones and undertones. The soft matte finish gives a natural, non-oily look with buildable medium to full coverage. It blends seamlessly and doesn’t oxidize, avoiding the common ashy look on dark skin. While it can feel a bit drying on combination or dry skin, pairing it with a hydrating primer solves this issue. Overall, it’s a fantastic, long-lasting foundation for women of color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation!!! I have been using it every time I do my makeup. It has a natural looking finish. Blends veryyy well! Good coverage as well, love that it has the pump.

reviews.review_title: Great coverage and feel on skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am really loving this so far. Got this free to review. Normally the wear of Fenty foundations at least from sampling in store are a bit too much for me but this blends out very well into my skin and dosent leave an orange or red undertone that I feared when first swatching. Its a perfect match on my skin. Im actually surprised. It also wears dewy which I love. I would compare it to Lancôme’s teint idole ultra care and glow foundation. This is very good so far and lasts very well throughout the day also. Doesnt feel heavy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great foundation! its a medium coverage while being hydrating without adding excess oil to my face. compared to her old hydrating formula this is much better!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m so excited to try out the Fenty Longwear foundation. I must say I’m hooked. This matches my shade perfectly blends well and makes my pores look seamless.  No scent at all and I’m loving it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Genuinely hydrating, gorgeous consistency, great shade range. Could be a little less shiny though (it can make me look sweaty).  And be warned -- shades 330/335 are vastly different (330 is WAY more yellow/gold than 335), even though they're listed as matches for the same Fenty Eaze Drop shade (14)!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Fenty Beauty Soft'Lit Naturally Luminous Longwear Foundation in Shade 230, and I’m so impressed! This foundation delivers a beautiful luminous finish without looking greasy. I love that it’s hydrating and gives my skin a natural glow that lasts all day. It’s medium coverage, but it feels incredibly lightweight, which is perfect for everyday wear.  One of the standout features for me is that it resists sweat, humidity, and transfer, making it ideal for long days. The Cyperus Papyrus Leaf Cell Extract and Kakadu Plum Extract are such a great addition—I can feel the hydration and see a slight improvement in my skin tone over time. Light scent and good packaging.  Overall, I highly recommend this foundation for anyone looking for a radiant, natural finish that stays put throughout the day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this coverage amazing, minish as if its not there 🫶🏽scent great, packaging not too much i did get wrong color my mistake but love it and was able to mix with a light one

reviews.review_title: My new foundation I use everyday

reviews.review_text: I noticed this foundation starts with a nice finish but I was having itches with it appearing splotchy after prolonged wear, I do have combination skin but it did crease on me even with setting spray and primer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the coverage, Fenty products are always my favorite because it matches my skins so well!!!! I would definitely recommend to anyone looking for the perfect finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage is amazing ! Nice smooth finish, no scent , cute packaging and the blend ability is so easy !! I absolutely love this it’s gonna be my go to for every day wear !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this is not my color so i tried on hands. the texture is very watery and easy to apply. it is pretty thin with a bit luminous effect and can be evenly applied. I somehow feel like it is not very long lasting though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this foundation, it’s my holy grail as an oily skin girly. This pairs well with elf’s hydro grip primer and huda beauty powder. It looks so seamless in person. The shade match is perfect, for reference I’m shade 120 in Maybelline fit me foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin and a lot of redness to cover. It’s difficult to find something that both wears well on my oily nose and chin but doesn’t emphasize the dry patches on my cheeks. This magically does both! It also really covers my redness without sitting heavy on the skin. Shade 25 is a great match for my fair neutral skin that leans a little warm. The finish is a natural finish in my opinion. Not super luminous but definitely not matte. I would call it natural or satin. It’s hard to find something with this much coverage that doesn’t make me look older but this fits the bill! So happy I tried this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this product in the first attempt. My face looked glowy with a matte finish. Pores were not visible and acne marks as well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It has a nice glowy finish and the shade match was absolutely perfect! It covered my redness and I also use it as concealer. Smells hood and packaging is good even when I travel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is absolutely amazing! The shade range is fantastic and the where is great. The finish is slightly shiny, which is great for summer months. I absolutely love the way. It looks on the skin. It’s amazing and I love it!

reviews.review_title: I like the tie. It's very pretty, it leaves good c
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It's very pretty, it has very good packaging, very good coverage, it leaves a very nice finish. The only bad thing is that it comes out a shade lighter than my skin, but everything has a solution. I will try to buy a shade that is lighter than my skin and I will mix it so as not to waste it because it is a good product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Fenty Foundation provided medium coverage. I love the finish not too dewy or matte. The packaging was a bit defective which cause the foundation to leak. I overall loved the shade of the product it was perfect !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loveeee this foundation.  It matched well with my complexion and was fairly easy to blend out with a sponge. Good coverage.  Did not feel heavy on my skin to where i could feel the makeup.  Would definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! Great addition to my makeup bag. Would consider purchasing again in the future. I am not sure how this will hold up with my sensitive skin but I like the way it looks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love ths complementary sample from the brand love how good the coverage and stay in place scent is amazing and packaging amazing and easy to apply good to blend and recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is SUCH a lightweight foundation, does not feel like you have makeup on feels like a skin tint! You do have to build it up tho for more coverage. I actually got a darker shade in the picture i mixed it with a lighter one! or else the  385 shade is more of a bronzer shade for me. It works amazing as a contour/bronzer too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The shade I received was a bit darker than I was expecting, however the formula was amazing! It gave me a natural looking finish with a glow! The packing was nice also. Love all fenty products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I really liked how the color looked on my skin, but I noticed that it’s made in Korea. I understand the formula is probably developed there, but after using it for a week, my face broke out in small pimples.👎

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was apprehensive at first to buy foundations as all the ones i’ve tried in the past broke my skin out, however, I saw this on sale and was like, why don’t i give it a try. This was such a good decision and I can’t recommend it enough! Such a good product and sits beautifully on the face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is my new go to. It has a medium coverage that’s build able . It leaves your skin with a very dewy finish . The packaging is also high quality and it the product itself blends like a dream. I used a beauty blender and it just melted into my skin so flawlessly.

Such a creamy foundation. I don’t usually like foundations that are too full coverage as I feel like they end up looking cakey, but now this one. This foundation is very creamy and provides the full coverage without making my face look like it had 10 pounds of foundation on it. The packaging is so cute and simple. I really like this product and I love how easily it blends. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this foundation as a sample from Influenster in exchange for my honest review and I was only able to get a shade that is too dark for me. I decided to use it as a contour shade and I really like how well the foundation stays in place. The product is very pigmented so a little bit goes a long ways! I would absolutely try this foundation in my correct shade to use as an all over coverage! From what I can tell, this product is very hydrating, pigmented, and bendable! I would recommend giving it a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I liked that this foundation wasn't super heavy on my skin yet still buildable for days when I need extra coverage. This was my first time using Fenty foundation. I like how it blends with my skin for a more natural finish. It does leave my skin a little on the shiny side but just because I have oily skin to begin with, so I just have to use some extra translucent powder to balance it out. Overall I'm happy with it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first time trying out the Fenty Beauty foundation and I was impressed. Before applying, I prepped my face and I used a brush to apply the foundation. It applies nicely with a foundation brush. The foundation didn't crease which I loved! It wear well and makes my face feel very smooth. I love that it's long lasting. I don't have to reapply and you'll be find leaving it on for a full work day. I really love this foundation. I received this item for free in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free in exchange for my review. This product is way to dark for me. So besides the color the actual product is great. It has amazing coverage and a nice texture. Blends very easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free in exchange for my review. This product is way to dark for me. So besides the color the actual product is great. It has amazing coverage and a nice texture. Blends very easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect foundation if you love a natural look. This makes my face look like I literally have no makeup on. I usually like a natural light looking face this does more than enough. Truly happy with my purchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this I do not user foundation I will always use a bb cream with tint because I love hydration but!!! I am so amazed by this foundation so far my favorite and worth the money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the product as it didn't break out my dry sensitive skin. I already had the matt version but it made my skin very dry.  It was a good color match too. I'm very sad that Fenty is not cruetly free anymore hence I'll will not be using it. Will have to search again for a good match.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation actually leaves a luminous finish! It doesn’t feel heavy on the skin and makes your makeup look flawless! Definitely recommend it!

reviews.review_title: Long wearing, buildable coverage, luminous finish
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is an extremely beautiful foundation. lasted me 10 hours. Skin like luminous natural finish. Medium buildable coverage. No skin irritation. Luxurious packaging. Easy to blend. Basically nothing wrong with this product, it’s amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought a darker shade for contouring and to mix with lighter shade and this finish is perfect. I love how the coverage is and definitely is very matte.

reviews.review_title: For the natural skin but better beauties
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color I recieved isnt my exact match a bit cool toned for me but it applies really well. Gives this skin like look or my skin but better. I have a oily t-zone and it last quite a while before needing a touch up. I'll give this a try again ans really test when I discover my color match.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation does what it claims, though it’s not transfer-proof, which I don’t mind. It gives a “your skin but better” look with a nice glow. The shade match is PERFECT (I could cry), I’m really happy, especially since finding olive-toned foundations is difficult.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is buildable, and did a pretty great job in covering my blemishes. It was very simple to blend out using a foundation brush, and I didn’t have any issues of separation during my wear. I also didn’t feel like I had any foundation on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed trying this product. The finish is slightly more matte than I am used to using, but beautiful nonetheless. It was full coverage and lasted all night for me! The packaging is also functional, I love the pump.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation! It covers well and makes my skin look healthy and glowy. I love the packaging and how easy it is to blend. It makes the skin dewy which is great!

reviews.review_title: Tried it but it's a no
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't find this to be hydrating at all. It definitely lasts, but it gives a matte finish and if you are off on the colour by just a bit, it will be obvious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lives up to its name!! Its feels great and applies so evenly and smooth. Once it dries it even feels soft. It stays on and does not transfer easy. You can do medium to heavier coverage. Another great product from Fenty!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Feels lightweight and every single time I wear this foundation people compliment by saying my skin looks amazing. I have never received so many compliments from a makeup product. 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the coverage on this product. The golden undertone is just right for me not orange which I love. Fenty for me never misses.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This shade unfortunately was not my match, but it is my friend’s perfect match. I did test this product and it is full coverage with a finish that feels like a lighter matte. Always love the packaging with fenty!

reviews.review_title: Does what it says it does!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been a cushion compact gal because I like how easy it is to apply and how luminous it makes me look. Well. Count me a convert because this Fenty beauty foundation does the same for my skin. I wore it all day with no primer to test longevity and it was above my expectations. The only knock is that this is a pump but it was not obvious to me when I got it and I thought it was a pour out bottle or a doe foot applicator that broke.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Influenster but u didn’t get the right shade so I cannot say much but the consistency is nice and I use it as a contour so I like it !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Shade cool pink is not cool or pink. It was extremely yellow and too dark for me sadly. I found it bunched up and creased easily, so I will have to return

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been loving Fenty Beauty’s soft’lit natural luminous longwear foundation. Like its name, it wears very naturally and has a little glow from within finish. I like to go light handed with the layer so it provides just a light layer of coverage to smooth out my pores. Just make sure your skin is prepped and hydrated so the foundation doesn’t cling to any dry spots. Overall lovely product and beautiful yet simple packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Incredible coverage. This was the wrong shade for me, but coverage is great. Blends easily and well with other products. I absolutely HATE the packaging - the applicator is just a stick and it gets everywhere/is messy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fenty has made an incredible foundation that goes on smoothly and lasts all day with some setting powder. The finish gives a beautiful glow and it’s at minimum medium coverage with the ability to build. Also has some sleek packaging!

reviews.review_title: NOT THE SAME FORMULA- GREASY AND UNBUILDABLE.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Formula IS NOT the same anymore. Do not consider incentivized reviews! Used This foundation literally for years since it’s conception and it’s always been my favorite. It’s terrible now….. What HAPPENED?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am a Fenty fan and they came through with this foundation again. This soft lit foundation is so nice for those who are avoiding soft matte but still want the coverage and the beautiful finish. It played well with all of my products and the final look was beautifully blended.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wore this product through a full day of work AND celebrating my birthday. My skin is naturally oily, hence the amount of shine at the end of the day. I did feel colorwise that the product did dry down slightly darker than the packaging led to believe. For medium coverage, I believe one pump was more than efficient for a full face of makeup. I will definitely be picking up more Fenty products in the future to play with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s fenty and coverage is awesome finish is awesome and blends like wow. Sets superb on my skin and gives perfect finish and smells really good too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous finish! Covers everything it needs to cover! It’s absolutely stunning! It evens out my skin tone and feels amazing on the skin. Blends out beautifully. And we can’t ignore the packaging can we??? It makes me feel rich! Absolutely beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great buildable and breathable foundation. I don’t typically use foundation so I was interested in a light formula. This feels great on the skin and isn’t overbearing. Would definitely recommend! The packaging is also very nice.  I received this for free in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: FULL coverage! Super pigmented. Takes a bit to blend but really great for a little going a long way! I would purchase again. The packaging is also super cute!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good coverage (full) and consistency. The shade was a Little different from my tone more pink than yellow. No scent. Packaging is good. I’d recommend but I’m not sure how long it stays.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: You can’t go wrong with this Soft'Lit Naturally Luminous Longwear Foundation from Fenty Beauty. I tried the shade 150, It is long wear with medium coverage. My skin gets luminous without looking greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The foundation is very easy to apply. It goes on very smoothly, and it feels like my own skin. I didn’t feel like I was wearing makeup. It has decent coverage and is quite long lasting.

Loved this foundation. It has great coverage and it truly was long lasting. I like that it doesn't feel heavy and it does give you a luminous finish without it being too shiny. The packaging is cute, I love the Lilac color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love how it leaves the natural finish on the skin, it's like a serum but long-lasting, the color is not so much my tone, but with a lighter corrector, the color is corrected. Its coverage is average but it is not easy. Easy to apply, does not irritate suitable for sensitive skin. I received this free product in exchange for honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty much flawless skin! Looking really hydrated and healthy without a shiney glow really lays down so nicely! I really love this foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation has great coverage and is very long lasting although this shade is a bit too dark for my with the correct one it would be perfect for all day wear

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for my review. The coverage is good and it is easy to blend. The best thing I like about this product is that there is no scent at all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product really does leave a soft and natural finish. I personally go in with a light application and it does the job but can also build it up if more coverage is preferred. The shade range is also amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Be careful did you have acne prone skin with this foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is amazing . Very lightweight and easy to blend . This foundation doesn’t have a chemical smell to it as well. The packaging is cute and the bottle . Looks higher end . It’s more of a medium coverage to me I have hyperpigmentation so I have to apply more . After trying this I want to try everything she offers !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Fenty Beauty and Influenster in exchange for an honest review. Fenty Beauty Soft’Lit Naturally Luminous Longwear Foundation in Shade 360 is usable, but did not wow me. The product itself looks very elegant and is a big size. When you open it to use it though, a TON of product comes out and creates a huge mess on the bottle, hands, and whatever surface you are using it over. I really did not like that aspect of it. Now, the foundation itself is pretty good. It blends in effortlessly and is light weight BUT is cakey. It sits on your pores. The look you achieve with it lasts all day and looks great for photographs. Overall, this is an okay product but a bit disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing foundation. Dries quickly feels very smooth and hydrating on the skin. Doesn’t make your skin too shiny looks very natural. It’s very light weight and stays on all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a part of an incentivized campaign. The foundation is a great shade match that provides a true medium coverage. With a lightweight feel, it also gives a glowy and moisturized look

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not bad. A little dark for me so definitely get color matched. Medium coverage and goes on well. Bottle is pretty and looks cute displayed. I would say it’s not my absolute favorite foundation for my skin but for sure a good option.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very good coverage, lighweight formula. Love that it is a good match for my skin tone. The scent isn’t strong and packaging is chic. Ingredients are good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I didn’t love the finish or the coverage of this foundation. It was really hard to get the right color match for me as well but it works with powder and contour blended on to the face. I would not buy it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation. Gave me a natural looking finish that isnt shiny but more on thr luminous side. It lasted long and gave great coverage thats buildable!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing! I love how much coverage I get while using it. I can go all day without needing any touch ups. The price is great for such an amazing quality product. I use in my daily makeup routine and will never go back. You will not be disappointed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a pretty good medium to full coverage foundation. It wears well throughout the day even on oily skin. I’m just not rating it higher because it doesn’t look natural. You can definitely tell I’m wearing foundation when I have it on, which is not my preference but some people don’t mind.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really solid bottle for foundation. The product blends beautifully and is pretty slowly once applied. I found that it had a pretty decent coverage once applied and the bottle is a really good size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the finish and bendability, but it doesn't last on my skin. It got split in certain areas of my face within 2 hours or wear, so its not love.  No scent.  The packaging is nice though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved this formula of this product. The only thing I would recommend is going 1-2 shades darker for a better match. The 360 was a bit light for me but outside of that, I have no regrets. Such a flawless coverage on my skin and easy to blend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This luminous foundation was great and long lasting. The coverage was perfect for my skin and was able to cover pimples and blemishes very well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The finish on this foundation is perfect! My skin is glowing !! It’s sooo smooth the shade match is a little lighter than my skin but I can still make it work! I love the flawlessness of this foundation!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When I say that this went on so smoothly, blends beautifully, is so lightweight and has full coverage!! Love love love. It lasted all day with no caking of melting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This isn’t my first time trying this  foundation . The first time i felt that when it oxidized it left a white cast on my face . I was happy to try it again thinking over the years the formula might have changed . Sadly it has done the same thing . I’m certain this is my color because when I apply it at first it looks fine until minutes later . I really wanted to enjoy this foundation but it just doesn’t work for me , even with bronzer and blush and highlight it didn’t look right to me .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fenty always gets it right! I love this medium coverage yet buildable foundation.  It's has little to no scent & asimple yet chic package. Definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty much flawless skin! Looking really hydrated and healthy without a shiney glow really lays down so nicely! I really love this foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This coverage is amazing. I mix it up with my sunscreen and it  still looks great . It doesn't really have a smell. The packaging is interesting it's a pump style bottle .the shade was a bit darker than my usual shade but since I mixed it with sunscreen it wasn't that off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I liked this at first but then it started to separate throughout the day. It was good coverage and looked good at first like the satin finish was perfect but it started to change. The packaging feels nice and the price seemed right but not enough to swing me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the color! It is a great match for my skin. I like how it’s creamy, smooth and feels lightweight. This foundation stays on truly all day (without a primer). I'm obsessed with this foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised by this foundation. It is pretty light weight but still has good coverage. It also blended well with my other products and the shade match was great. I also like the natural yet luminous finish it has once I set it. I will for sure be keeping it in my foundation rotation going forward.

reviews.review_title: Good foundation but not in humid climates
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Fenty Beauty Soft’Lit Naturally Luminous Foundation has a beautiful, smooth finish—definitely smoother than the matte version. The coverage is equally smooth, and three pumps gave me great results. I also appreciate that it doesn’t seem to have any fragrance, and I had no breakouts after using it, which is a huge plus! Very nice packaging! I love the glass bottle!  However, it didn’t perform as well in humid conditions. After a few hours, it started to show texture, creased in some areas, and oxidized slightly, with a little orange tint peeking through. And this is with minimal time outside! I think it would work much better in cooler, drier climates. Overall, it’s okay, but not ideal for humid weather.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love it. It looks so natural  on my face.I am not a makeup  wearer, but I see so many commercials  about Sephora and Fenty I decided  to try it. Fell in love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Fenty soft’lit naturally, luminous long wear foundation was a perfect match to my skin. In the bottle, it looked lighter than several of my other foundations, but surprisingly it was perfect. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Does what it says (with a small exception)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This newer foundation from Fenty is lovely, and the claims are pretty accurate. You have to take into account the product vs your skin and what you want, if that makes sense. For example, I prefer lighter coverage foundations most days and medium for special occasions, so my reviews are always based on what the product claims to do, I wouldn’t ding this and say “I want a sheer finish but this is too heavy,” when it’s not marketed as sheer. Some other reviews of this product do that sort of review which I think is unfair.   That being said, this foundation does make a claim that I think is just about impossible: it claims to reduce shine while also being hydrating and glowy. I’ve been around a while and have seen a number of products make this claim and I don’t think any have truly accomplished it. I don’t reduce my rating because of that because I think most people realize that is a contradiction but just be aware.  However, I found all other claims technically accurate - I found it medium coverage, natural finish (per Sephora), long wearing, and transfer resistant. The skincare benefits would take time to notice, and I don’t expect a foundation to replace skincare - if you have dry skin, still use your moisturizer. This didn’t dry my skin out or make my dry patches worse but if you have flaky skin it won’t cure that.   For the price, quality, and unmatched shade range, I think this is a fab product! Yes, there may be less expensive options (doubtful as to shade options) but there are certainly more expensive ones that don’t perform as well either.

As for the wearability, it still looked pretty good after a long day. I did notice separating around my T-Zone but I think that had more to do with the way I prepped my skin. Overall, it’s a great foundation for every day wear!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It works well it’s just that I have combination skin and it feels like it clings way more to my dryer patches but rubs off my oily zones. It doesn’t blend as well as I’d like it to but maybe that’s just me. Otherwise it’s a good foundation just would have hoped for more considering the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a perfect formula, doesn’t have a sweaty looks but just healthy. I used this as a bronze and contour as it’s a bit to dark but next summer in the middle of the season it’ll be perfect! I can’t wait to wear it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this soft little naturally luminous longwear foundation make up. It very natural and light weight when i put my makeup on. Smell good. Packaging is beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this foundation. It blends really well and felt great on my skin without smothering my skin. The bottle is a fun shape also. Definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Fenty Beauty Soft’Lit Naturally Luminous Longwear Foundation in shade 385, and it’s amazing! It gives me a gorgeous glow without looking greasy and holds up well against humidity and sweat. The medium coverage is just right, and the formula feels super lightweight on my skin. I also love that it hydrates all day and has ingredients like Kakadu Plum to brighten my skin over time. If you want a foundation that’s long-lasting, natural-looking, and comfortable, this is definitely worth trying!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fenty’s Soft Lit Foundation offers a lightweight, natural finish with buildable coverage. Perfect for a flawless glow! The shade match too is on point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: To preface: this wasn’t the right shade and I know shade can affect how it appears on the skin. That being said it just…wasn’t great. When applied with a brush it clung to all my peach fuzz(which shouldn’t need to be shaved!) and it was just eh when applied with my fingers. I just expected more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the Fenty Beauty Soft’Lit Naturally Luminous Longwear Foundation. I received the shade 230 complimentary for exchange for my honest review. I really love the foundation itself because it blends like a dream but this shade is too light for me. This foundation is long-wearing and it gives you the prettiest glow! It is medium coverage but also buildable so it’s perfect! Honestly it’s one of my favorite foundations now. Definitely worth buying!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Influenster. However I previously purchased this. This is definitely not for me! I wanted to love it but it doesn’t work great with my oily skin. I feel like it doesn’t blend correctly for me. It doesn’t cover the way I would like. I love the packaging though because it glass but that all I can say.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the Fenty Beauty Soft’Lit Naturally Luminous Longwear Foundation. I received the shade 230 complimentary for exchange for my honest review. I really love the foundation itself because it blends like a dream but this shade is too light for me. This foundation is long-wearing and it gives you the prettiest glow! It is medium coverage but also buildable so it’s perfect! Honestly it’s one of my favorite foundations now. Definitely worth buying!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed trying this foundation. It has high coverage and is more matte than I expected but it didn’t dry my skin out. It didn’t crease or settle in my pores/lines. It still looked good after 8 hours of wear. However, it did transfer more than other foundations I use even after setting with a powder. It also flaked off a little during the day mainly on my nose and chin. This wasn’t too noticeable. Overall i liked this foundation and will continue to wear it when I want high coverage and know I can touch it up if needed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The first thing I noticed was the lightweight texture, which makes application effortless. It glides on smoothly and blends seamlessly, providing a natural finish that doesn’t feel heavy or cakey.  One of the standout features of this foundation is its buildable coverage. On days when I want a more subtle look, I can apply a small amount, and it still evens out my complexion beautifully. For occasions when I need more coverage, it layers well without becoming thick. This versatility is perfect for adapting to different situations.  The foundation does an impressive job of controlling oil throughout the day. With my combination skin, I often struggle with shine, but Fenty’s formula keeps me looking fresh for several hours. I’ve found that I rarely need to touch up, which is a huge plus for busy days. Additionally, it doesn’t clog my pores, which is essential for maintaining skin health.  Shade 150 matches my skin tone perfectly, blending effortlessly into my complexion. I appreciate how it enhances my natural radiance rather than masking it. Overall, Fenty Natural Luminous Foundation is a fantastic choice for anyone with similar skin concerns. It delivers a luminous look while controlling oil, making it a staple in my makeup routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Fenty really can do no wrong, and this foundation is no exception. I am NOT a foundation girly as I’m pushing 30 and it usually just feels so heavy and cakey. Not on miss Riris watch!!!! This sits so beautifully on the skin it’s hard to tell that you’re even wearing makeup! The coverage? Flawless. The blend? Immaculate. The SHADE RANGE????? REVOLUTIONARY. Fenty has and will continue to be that girl and I am so glad we live in a time where makeup is not only Inclusive to a wide range of skin tones and types, but doesn’t look like clown makeup. I can’t sing the praises of this foundation enough. I like this natural finish much more than the original matte formula, too. 10 🌟

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This new Soft’Lit Naturally Luminous Longwear Foundation by Fenty has been working really well for me! No foundation these days are really mind blowing anymore but this foundation does actually live up to the hype. Beautiful packaging with traditional Fenty shape and feel. Little to no scent which I like. Fenty always does a phenomenal job with their shade range.. I think everyone could find a shade that works for them. I use Shade 180, a light- medium with neutral undertones. Has a medium + buildable coverage with a luminous/ natural finish. Blends into the skin effortlessly. I have combo/oily skin & this foundation lasts all night without transfer or separating which is important to me. Usually a dewy foundation doesn’t last this well on my skin so impressed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Fenty Beauty Foundation stands out for its impressive inclusivity, offering a wide range of shades to cater to diverse skin tones. The packaging is sleek and practical, featuring a pump for easy application. The foundation has a lightweight, liquid texture that blends seamlessly into the skin, providing medium to full buildable coverage with a matte finish. It works especially well for oily and combination skin types, though those with dry skin may need to use a hydrating primer. With a long-lasting formula that can hold up for 8-10 hours, it's a great option for all-day wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation isn’t any better than drug store brands. It needs a base and a lot of blending. This foundation leaves a powdery look and shows pores. It feels slightly thick as well. It works fine with a full makeup routine but is nothing special and I probably wouldn’t buy it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Guessed my shade on a whim but it matches perfectly! This foundation blends nicely - I usually use a spatula brush to put the foundation on, then use a damp beauty blender to blend it in. Pretty good coverage, blendable, and it’s not too sheer or too heavy. Probably one of my favorite foundations I’ve tried so far! The packaging is nice too. Thanks to influenster for letting me try this out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I would describe this one as a medium to light coverage with the possibility of building up to full medium it covered the imperfections I wanted to cover and I think is a real good every day foundation specially if you like a more lightweight feel and not a matte full beat for every day. I have extremely oily skin and it lasted better than other luminous foundations in my skin, would really recommend it

reviews.review_title: Get it! You’re going to love it!!

reviews.review_text: I love this foundation! It’s medium coverage  which I love because it doesn’t feel caked on. I would say the finish is more of a satin finish so it’s not fully matte but also not dewy.  I got the 420 because it’s my fall/winter shade. During the summer I use the 440. I love the shade range!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Big fan of the OG matte formula, but this one makes my naturally oily skin look wet all day long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a free sample* This foundation surpassed my expectations. I wanted to give it some pretty harsh conditions to work with, so I didn't moisturize or add a primer, and it still delivered. I used it with a brush on one side and a blender on the other. To me, the blender made it look seamless with my skin. Products layered easily on it, there was no smell, the shade was a perfect match, and the coverage was there. I would recommend this foundation any day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The quality of this foundation is too good, its formula is exquisite and it blends super well into the skin leaving a beautiful glowy finish but it doesn't look greasy. It feels like a second skin. It's definitely a 10/10.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is perfect! I typically have a combination skin which means I have an oily t-zone but super dry skin all around. This does not cling in to dry patches nor make my skin feel extremely oily. It’s also super easy to find my match online! The packaging is sturdy and does not have any fragrance!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage, not too heavy. The shade matches well to my skin and it blends well. Not a strong scent which is nice. The bottle is so easy to use and looks nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my favorite foundations to use. It’s very light weight and I don’t need a lot to get the job done. I also love the skin like finish it gives !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have mix feelings about this foundation. The first time I tried it it separated and emphasize my peach fuzz. With that I tried it again after I dermaplated my face and it was light and buildable. Even though the shade is about 2 shades lighter I could make it work. Definitely can be build to a medium coverage but I prefer a light hand with this foundation. It has a very nice glow as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m obsessed!!!!! The coverage is so good. It doesn’t leave my skin oily but it doesn’t cake up. It’s very light but still covers so well. It blends seamlessly with my other making. The bottle leaks but it’s really pretty. I didn’t notice a scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice finish and looks natural and not oily nor matte, basically what you want on a foundation that is not heavy. The scent is great not strong or bad. The packing looks nice on your night stand. Blends great and lasts all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed this foundation. I generally don’t like it because it’s so thick, but this one was very lightweight and felt like a skin tint, but had the full coverage effect. I will say that it did apply patchy in some places of my skin, but maybe didn’t exactly work with the primer, but even after a retry I noticed some patchiness. I think that it was really full coverage and you can mix it with moisturizer for more a bronzed look if you are like me and got a shade too dark!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was not disappointed by this foundation! I’ve been looking for a more dewy, glowy finish foundation and this is it. It’s a liquid foundation, so it’s easy to blend with a beauty blender. The foundation didn’t settle into any lines or pores, and it created a super smooth canvas on my face. My favorite part of the foundation is the finish, though. It makes my skin glow and look super fresh and dewy, but not too much either. I think this would be a great foundation for everyday wear. I would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a big Fenty Beauty user and was excited to try this one. The color did look a little off but once I put it on my face it looked great. Left a soft finish and didn’t leave my makeup cakey so that’s definitely a plus :)

reviews.review_title: Smooth and lightweight foundation. Too tan for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great foundation! Was a bit too dark for me but blended it with a lighter concealer (works perfect with fenty concealer). Very moisturizing and lasts a day. Very comfortable and non drying. Smell very clean and fresh.  This product was sent to me in exchange for a review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Fenty Beauty’s Soft’Lit longwear foundation truly lives up to its name. The foundation’s medium coverage provides almost a full coverage without looking cakey or fake. Just a little bit of formula goes a long way and continues to look natural looking. You can wear this product for a full 12 hour work day without having to reapply. The shade also matched perfectly with my skin tone. Could become my new go-to foundation.

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product isn’t my shade, but I was able to find use out of it by using it as a contour. It has no scent, and it’s easily blended. The packaging is simple and the dispenser allows for easy application. I’d give it the full 5 stars if it contained some sort of SPF. I received this as a free sample.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am not a big foundation girly but this one works well with my combination skin. The finish is really nice, not too glowy. I applied with a brush and a sponge. The coverage is great! It feels lightweight on my skin. Great packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the foundation I can tell a difference between the other gently one it has a good coverage and I liked how it gave my overall look a glowy look

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received this Foundation for free from Influenster, and Fenty beauty in exchange for my honest review. I loved the coverage of this foundation, the color I picked was a little too dark for me, but I managed to use it, and give an honest review. The finish was great, my makeup looked mesmerizing. Very easy to blend, and has a normal scent, not uncomfortable to wear at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I haven’t worn foundation in years (since before I knew what I was doing re: skincare and makeup), so I was hesitant as I’ve been burned by too many products to count. Even my full glam only goes as far as tinted moisturizers, bb creams, and concealer for coverage. As my tan fades and the pale/red complexion returns, I was looking for something with a bit more coverage for some formal events coming up. After moisturizing and shaking the bottle well, I applied the product using two methods. On one side I applied the foundation using a beauty blender (1 pump on the back of hand blended out with a damp sponge). On the other side I applied 1 pump to a dense foundation brush and used a stippling motion to get the foundation on my skin and a soft swiping motion to blend it out. Immediately I noticed that the brush method allowed for better uniform, buildable coverage that was super manageable. At first I was scared by how much coverage I got (felt like a clown), but my skin still felt very hydrated and like I wasn’t wearing a mask. It didn’t crease or seep into my forehead wrinkles either. Despite the coverage being more than I’m used to, the foundation was very light, luminous, and non-drying. Since I haven’t figured out my true skin tone, I may have gotten a SLIGHTLY wrong shade (170 is light w cool pink undertones), but I was able to use a bit of bronzer blush and contour to add a bit more life to the canvas (my face lol). All products layered on top of the foundation so nicely. Overall so much easier to use than I expected. I walked my dog in the hot rain to test the claims it’s sweat-humidity-transfer-proof and I was super impressed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation so much! I’m really attached to the current foundation I use but this might just replace it! The medium coverage is perfect to me, just enough. The finish is very natural and flatters your skin. It lasts great throughout a long work day and in hot weather. Highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This Fenty Beauty Soft’Lit Naturally Luminous Longwear Foundation is EVERYTHING! It comes in a 1.08 0z frosted glass tube with a pump. I requested the shade 420 since fall is approaching and it was a wise choice. This foundation is lightweight with full coverage that blends effortlessly. It has absolutely no scent  which is a plus for those of us who prefer it. Once fully applied you don’t even feel like you’re wearing makeup at all. It lasts me all day,even with minimal product used during application. The finish is satin-like with a subtle glow that appears as flawless skin. I will be switching to this foundation from now on and can’t wait to get more shades to mix during the colder months. My color dulls/ lightens during the colder months and deepens during the summer. I’ve just found a makeup staple!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried this foundation, and I have to say, it’s impressive. The shade range is incredible, so it’s easy to find a perfect match. I love how it gives a finish that looks natural, yet provides great coverage without feeling heavy. It lasts all day, even in humidity, which is a big plus. Blending it is a breeze, and it feels lightweight on my skin. It controls shine well but since I have oily skin, I felt it made me glow a little too much. I would recommend especially if you have dry skin. Overall, I’m really happy with it and think it’s a fantastic option for anyone looking for reliable coverage!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This liquid foundation comes with a very nice packaging, good for travel, I choose the wrong shade for my skin. But it’s blending very nice and give you a good finish and high coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My title pretty much sums it up. The product is good and gives a nice airbrushed finish. Not shiny and not matte but natural looking. Feels lightweight and airy. But my goodness I am so fed up with bad packaging. You open the bottle one time and the foundation gets everywhere. It drips off the applicator onto the bottle. If the bottle isn’t sitting straight up it will spill out everywhere so you can’t travel with it. The hassle of the product getting everywhere makes it not worth the quality of the product for me personally.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using the SOFT’LIT foundation for a couple of weeks, and I have to say, it’s giving everything I wanted in a foundation. First off, the finish is exactly what it promises—luminous without looking greasy. It’s like my skin, but so much better, giving me this soft glow, like golden hour all day long. And the best part? It doesn’t just sit on top of my skin; it really feels like it becomes part of it. It’s super lightweight, and I forget I’m wearing it most of the time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Look at how FLAWLESS my skin looks! This foundation is so perfect for a full coverage face! It matches perfectly with my skin ! It comes in this tall container and you only need a little so this will lasts for a long time! No scent 🩶

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is marvelous as always, but the product itself its lack luster. It was the right color but the undertone is incorrect. I tried to match more to my color after having a gauged point to match, I do had to blend the closest correct shade with my normal foundation. It’s too watery by itself as well.

It can get a bit messy. Overall, I'd recommend.

reviews.review_text: Obviously not my shade but I pass it to my friend and this is what she hast to say;  -Buildable coverage…love the finish it gives a beautiful luminous healthy skin…the pump make it easy to use/apply…blends perfectly I love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved the texture and how smooth it is. I unfortunately got a shade too light but I use it to brighten certain parts of my face and it still does a fantastic job

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
