I wore it for 8 hrs and it lasted all throughout the day.  Would definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I  received the Soft'Lit Naturally Luminous Foundation from Fenty Beauty, and was initially excited to try it. The packaging is sleek and modern, it's matte glass... So beautiful! But the foundation itself fell below my expectations. The coverage is significantly sheerer than advertised. It also took an unusually long time to dry down and set, which I think makes it impractical for everyday use. For those with oily skin, I wouldn't recommend this foundation. Even with a silicone-based primer, it didn't hold up well. I ordered the wrong shade so used it for contouring, but it was so sheer that I was barely able to see it. I am a little disappointed, I expected more. Hopefully this is not everyone else's experience.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Overall, I did like this product. It is very lightweight and buildable. It leaves a nice finish, but unfortunately, I had sweat it off during the day. I did end up seeing some patches and streaks but I could blame my powder for it. The formula feels clean. Works well with combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage is amazing! I love the finish of the foundation as well as how it applies on the face. This only issue I had is I got shade 450 neutral and it was not the shade as the picture on there website and it was orange. Definitely recommend this foundation, but make sure you get your correct shade!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use shade #150 Pro Filt'r Soft Matte Longwear Foundation and I'm so satisfied with it. The shade description matches the product and it matches my skin perfectly. It's lightweight, just a small amount of it would blend my whole face flawlessly and it lasts all day long. Highly recommended.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing! It blends very well with my complexion and is a very buildable foundation. I like the packaging for this product and will add this to my makeup routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked this Foundation formula is easy to blend. Medium coverage very skin like. The shade was too dark for me but I made it work. I will be purchasing my shade I loved how it left me luminous without looking greasy just skin like. Works well with other products and packaging is sleek, clean and very luxury feel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Looks good! Right shade but I had tried this and it comes out cakey for me, I prefer using my elf color corrector that comes out smooth rather than using this but besides that feels nice and seems good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love that this foundation has a significant shade range! I was able to shade match perfectly! I loved the finish and it was a blendable product. It was not drying in my skin and I had a glowy finish. I love how nice the product feels on my skin. A little product goes a long way, so you really need a little. Definitely recommend trying this and it’s at a great price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m so glad I got to try this foundation. Shade 185 compliments my skin tone! The texture is on the liquid side. It spreads easily and evenly with a quality foundation brush. The finish is truly luminous and it lasts all day! The scent is “oily” and I cannot smell any artificial fragrances.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation went on so well and smoothly! I absolutely loved the texture. Packaging was very cute too! Coverage was great not too much and not too little just the right amount for every day use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first, I thought I picked the wrong shade because it looked lighter and cooler than expected. I'm usually a neutral, but I went ahead and applied it, and it turned out to be a perfect match. The foundation provides full coverage and does an amazing job of hiding the redness on my cheeks and chin. I have combination skin with dryness around my nose and some lines under my eyes, but this foundation didn't emphasize those or settle into fine lines. My T-zone tends to get oily, but this foundation didn’t make it worse, maintaining a natural finish. I think I've finally found my go to foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted to me by Influenster in exchange for my honest review. Not really a fan of matter but was excited to try it out. The smell was clean and was pretty thick and semi bendable. The coverage is super high and makes you look a bit cakey. Overall the finish wasn’t my cup of tea. Packaging is cute.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Full coverage. Smooth and does not feel heavy at all. Has a nice creamy finish, not too shiny. Scent is tolerable and the packaging is very high end with the glass bottle. Huge shade range!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation! It is easy to blend with beautiful coverage. Many shades available to match any skin color and tone. Minimalistic packaging and easy use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this new Fenty Beauty foundation, it is hydrating, creamy and very lightweight. It provides a medium coverage with a soft matte finish. I like that it’s long lasting and buildable with the rest of my skincare and makeup routine. It goes on very smooth and provides a natural kind of look perfect without the cakey effect. I use it in a daily basis for my everyday look.

reviews.review_title: Good Coverage and Natural Looking! I love it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Omggg! This is my first time trying Fenty Skin Foundation and I absolutely love this one! Also, 420 is my shade! I am so happy that I was able to find my shade on my first try. I look the finished look after applying the foundation on my skin. It gives a dewy, yet natural look! This is now my go-to foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very luminous indeed. Have a nice glow. Blends well. Coverage is medium. Have a tone to color also. Went on smooth, not cakey. Not really scented.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a light skin tone and I got this for contouring and I am absolutely loving it. I was sent this product for review purposes so I wasn’t able to get my correct shade in time but I will say this is a great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very blendable on the skin and didn't feel heavy. I was able to build it up for more coverage too. I didn't feel like it was the exact match for me but I was able to make it work. It did seem like my face looked a bit too shiny at times, esp after it's been on my skin for some time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I love fenty just like the next girl! The application is smooth, and you really don’t need much for a light look. The bottle is so soo pretty and sturdy too. My only issue was that it was too orange for me. I had to add some blue pigment into it to help neutralize the shade, but it’s a pretty close match aside from the orange-yness i see in most of their shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Packaging is sturdy in glass bottle. The lightweight formula, smooth, comfortable, easy to apply with a brush, medium coverage, with a natural-looking luminous finish. I got shade 300 (warm golden). It’s too dark for my skin. If you have oily skin you must use primer and powder. It lasts long about 4-5 hours. I think it might be best for normal or dry skin but not for aging, oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster in exchange for an honest review. I would consider this to be more of a skin tint than a foundation since it is so lightweight and doesn’t have high coverage. It looks nice on the skin once blended but doesn’t cover much redness for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ruined my skin I have never had this happen with any product before so so sad:(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage is flawless—just the right amount to even out my complexion without feeling heavy or cakey. It blends seamlessly and leaves my skin with a beautiful matte finish that lasts all day. I also appreciate how lightweight it feels, and it doesn’t settle into fine lines or dry patches.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Fenty Beauty Soft’Lit Naturally Luminous Longwear Foundation is simple but very nice. It’s very creamy and has good coverage. It applies so flawlessly with a sponge, brush, or fingers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got excited when I found out I was going to receive a Fenty beauty make up foundation, but unfortunately, the shade that I thought would match my skin tone did not, but I still use it as a base for my make up. When I say base I mean as in after you put your primer you go in with the foundation that doesn’t match your skin it’s like you’re mixing it or you just use it as concealer in general. Or you can just grab a darker foundation and mix it together. The finish look is so bomb. It is so smooth to apply. Also have a cousin who I use it on it matches her and she loves iY:

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The foundation has wide shade range, lightweight formula, and soft matte finish, offering buildable coverage that lasts all day, especially for normal to oily skin types. I love its natural look, though for my dry skin I find it slightly drying, and there is some oxidation. While it’s great for a matte, natural finish, I am seeking a dewy or more luminous look so prefer a more hydrating option.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The bottle itself is simple but very nice. I like the little pump it has to dispense the product. Shade is a perfect match. Gave a nice dewy finish, overall it lasted long, didn’t come out cakey and had great coverage! definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very creamy and has good coverage. There isn’t really a scent which I like. The packaging is very nice and it is a big size. The finish is nice and smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty good but I felt it was a little hard to blend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation! It applies so flawlessly with a sponge, brush, or fingers. I’m excited to try application with my new BK beauty brushes! The finish is really nice as I don’t think it’s too glowy and I like that it doesn’t have “glitter/shimmer” in the formula. I don’t believe it is scented so probably a good option for sensitive skin. The shade I was sent is a little dark for me, but it works for me when I mixed it with my lighter shade foundations for the winter. I’ll probably mix In some white pigment to get it to the right shade for me. I would recommend this product! I’m going to try out the soft matte version of this foundation now!!

reviews.review_title: I received this product as a free sample!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve never been a foundation person but after I tried this foundation and feeling how lightweight it feels on me I’m definitely going to use this foundation. I appreciate how you could build this foundation without it looking cakey it illuminates the skin not leaving the face perceiving as greasy. I would recommend this to everyone and I would purchase this product.

reviews.review_title: New must have in my routine !
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a gorgeous foundation it’s not too sheer it heavy it’s perfect ! Great for the natural look i love it so much!! There is no scent to it which is nice and the pump works beautifully.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I never use foundation in my routine so i was unsure if i would like this but now that ive tried it im never going back it’s SO good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is beautiful. I have the original pro filt’r soft matte longewear foundation in the shade 185 and I love this one more for everyday wear! It’s lighter and has a natural finish. The shade is different but works perfect for me. It will be a staple in my vanity for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I normally struggle finding the right shade of foundation since I have a yellow undertone but this shade was perfect for me. It does have a nice coverage but it’s still gives you a natural look and it was not oily for my combination skin, it lasted me all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The shade is very suit for my wife's skin tone, My wift said it has good coverage and lightweight, but she thinks it maybe suit for oily skin, if you have dry skin, please moisturize well before applying it to your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation feels nice and light on the skin and lasts throughout the day. My skin can get oily after a long day but the foundation seemed to hold up pretty well. Packaging is nice and sleek, and there are no strong scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is amazing! The finish is smooth and silky. Super easy to blend. I would say the coverage is medium to full and definitely buildable. I love that it’s zero fragrance. Packaging is cute and simple.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My girlfriend loved this foundation. It wasn't her correct shade so she used it as a liquid bronzer. She said that was it was very easy to blend out and she was able to build it up with no issue. She loves loved the finsh it gave her face!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It has been always difficult for me to match the exact color in the Influenster Campaigns. This almost matches my skin tone, I tried to see the consistency and it is lightweight which is what I most liked about this foundation because I don’t like to feel my skin like a cake, I also noticed It covers the blemishes very well which is another thing I loved about it. The reason why I give it 3 stars is because it doesn’t help with my break outs, I have an acne skin prone and I noticed I broke out after using this foundation. Except for that and the right tone this foundation would have worked perfectly for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a cool-toned girly, it can be hard to find shades that don’t look too orange or yellow on me. This matched me perfectly when I first got it! Unfortunately, soon after I went on vacation and now it’s a little too late for my tanned skin. But because the undertone is a perfect match, I can use it to lighten up areas like underneath my eyes or cover up blemishes and dark spots. It leaves such a natural yet radiant finish that wears long like a matte foundation. I can't wait to wear this all winter long once my skin is back to its normal tone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: 10/10. This foundation is amazing. I didn’t know much about it when it was sent to me so my hopes of it being good were somewhere in The middle but it has exceeded any expectation I have had. I can put it on so so fast and compared to other foundations I’ve tried I can say 100% this is the most buildable one. No scent (I don’t think) and packaging is perfect. Seriously have nothing bad to say I will continue to buy this and the shade range is excellent could not say enough about how great this is. I wear to work and lasts my whole 12 hour day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i'm so happy i got this foundation, i've been looking for one that works for my dry skin, has good coverage but isn't cakey, and blends well and this checks all my boxes!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been a fan of Fenty Beauty for couple weeks, and the Soft’Lit Naturally Luminous Longwear Foundation definitely lives up to the brand’s high standards. I tried Shade 185, which is a perfect match for light skin with neutral undertones, and I was instantly impressed by the formula. The foundation has a lightweight, silky texture that glides smoothly onto the skin. It blends effortlessly, and I noticed how buildable the coverage is—light for a natural, glowing look or medium if you want more coverage. It doesn’t cake or settle into fine lines, which is a huge plus. What sets this foundation apart is its luminous, soft-matte finish. It’s the perfect balance between dewy and matte, giving my skin a healthy, natural radiance without looking greasy. Even after hours of wear, it still looked fresh and luminous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: absolutely, I like Fenty beauty Soft'Lit Naturally LumiyLongwear Foundation. It's gentle and leaves my skin radiant whole day. But, I should choose other shade. That's the best choose. Nice and cute packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very happy with the results of this foundation. The shade match was perfect, I am light skin tone and got the shade 170. One pump of this gives a medium to full coverage look for me. I’m more of a lighter coverage girl so I use half a pump and this covers everything while still looking like my skin. This is a natural luminous look and I agree. Wears well throughout the day and I will definitely be reaching for this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is cute and firm. The foundation is easy to apply and have a dewy and natural finish. I have no problem with the coverage, so i think it's done pretty good job

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice coverage foundation, the shade blends well with concealor on top of it. The bottle confused me a tiny bit, I didn’t realize it was a pump too and was trying to unscrew it because I’m dumb. But I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation has a full coverage look. Its very light weight makes it look like you're not wearing anything It gives a natural look.. it doesn't smell. The packaging is amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was incentivized by Influenster and Fenty Beauty with this complimentary product in exchange for my honest review.   What an amazing foundation!  First, let me say that the color description that correlates to the picture shown for skin tone matching was spot on.  I don’t think I’ve ever found a foundation that has ever matched so accurately.  The bottle is made of a frosted glass that looks like columns so it won’t slip out of your hands when you hold it.  The pump feature dispenses just the right amount of makeup to cover each quadrant of your face.  The consistency of the product is very light and isn’t cakey.  It does rest right inside of your fine lines and wrinkles unfortunately so I had to put a primer underneath to combat that problem. I would highly recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is absolutely amazing! I love how it looks on my skin so glowy, and it blends like butter so easily! The packaging is amazing so simple yet pretty!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received from Influenster to review this product. It’s a light weight foundation with a glowy finish. It does cling to dry areas of the skin but not too bad. Has no scent which I’m grateful. It can be buildable. It applies better with a brush then with a sponge.

reviews.review_title: Fell in love with this foundation !
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first fenty product and I love it! Super light but has the perfect coverage, has a glowy luminous look to it it is just perfect I can’t believe I’ve been missing out on fenty this whole time !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely thrilled with Fenty Beauty's Soft'Lit Naturally Luminous Longwear Foundation! 🌟 This foundation is a game-changer, delivering a stunning glow that lasts all day. After wearing it for six hours, my skin still looked radiant and fresh, without any oxidation—unlike other foundations I've tried. The coverage is medium to light and very lightweight.   What I love most is its versatility. You can easily layer it with other products for a customized finish, making it perfect for any look. If you're aiming for that natural skin effect, this is a must-have in your makeup routine. Just keep in mind, if you prefer a matte finish, this isn’t the one for you. But for anyone seeking that beautiful, luminous glow, I highly recommend adding this to your daily rotation! It’s simply fabulous!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is really nice! The container is beautiful but I wouldn't carry it around. As for the foundation is perfect if you like a medium coverage it is light and gives a matte look. Radiant!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color match was perfect for me. The formula is breathable, lightweight and buildable. It blends well and leaves the skin with a soft glow. Soft ‘Lit is an accurate name for this foundation. The packaging is sleek and and I love that the stick for the pump goes all the way down so you can scrape the bottle and get every drop. It doesn’t have a scent which I like as well. A little goes a long way so you can use it for a natural look or add more for full on glam. (In the photo I only have it on my cheek area so you can see the match)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using Fenty Beauty’s Luminous Foundation in shade 230 for a few weeks, and it’s really impressed me. I deal with post-acne hyperpigmentation, and this foundation hides it well without feeling heavy or cakey. It gives a natural, subtle glow that doesn’t turn shiny, even after hours of wear. The coverage is buildable, so you can keep it light or layer it for more. It’s lightweight, stays on through sweat and humidity, and doesn’t transfer easily. Plus, the super inclusive foundation range means there’s a match for everyone, which I love. Over time, I’ve noticed my skin tone looks more even, which is a nice added benefit!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love it it melts into my skin so good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: *Received for free in exchange for my honest review*  I love the buildable factor of this foundation, from medium to full coverage whenever I want. I’ve had previous experience with the Fenty Pro Filt’r and it was one of my favorite foundations however I’m so glad I got to try the Fenty Soft Filt’r! I love the luminous finish and it’s not extremely glowy, more of a natural brightening glow which looks so beautiful in the sun. The texture of this foundation is very liquidity but you also need to act fast as it dries quickly. I highly advise blending as you put it on your face or else it may be a bit patchy. Coverage is amazing and so is the many shades range. As always, spray with a setting spray for maximum staying power.

reviews.review_title: It’s my go-to for healthy, glowing skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It provides flawless coverage without feeling heavy, and I love that it’s made with safe, skin-friendly ingredients—unlike some other foundations that can be harsh on your skin. It blends seamlessly and lasts all day, keeping my skin looking fresh without clogging pores. With so many shades available, I easily found my perfect match.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited for this foundation and it did not disappoint! It lasts all day and my skin does not get oily after a couple of hours. It also makes my skin look fabulous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a first impressions review but wow FENTY DID THAT with the shade match. I am an olive skin tone and it's almost impossible for me to find a good shade match for my skin even if a foundation markets itself OLIVE. Some OLIVE's are still too warm (orange) on me which is odd but this is PERFECT...It blends into my skin and it is undetectable in terms of shade match. IT AN OLIVE neutral. Besides the shade match, the foundation feels and looks great. But it is an initial impression...I have to test it out more. But WOW I am impressed with this shade match .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was given this to review with influencer The coverage is medium to full coverage. The finish is on the dewy side but not too shiny it’s just natural. I had no problems with the actual scent. The packaging was super cute super simple straight to the point. I would recommend and repurchase this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It’s gorgeous on the skin! I am usually a tinted moisturizer girl so I use foundation really sparingly, this was so beautiful on my skin. Very natural looking and wore well through the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product has good coverage but was a bit cakey on my skin. Even with good skin prep, it settled into fine lines for me and I didn’t love the finished look. It was easy to blend but didn’t look as luminous as I like. I personally would not purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review. I actually used this as a bronzer because it was too dark as a foundation. This blended well and was super hydrating on my dry skin. I found this to be glowy and easy to use. There was minimal scent and the packaging was totally fine and not messy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay finally a good foundation!!! Usually everything cakes on for me but not this! The formula is soft and light, and it’s literally a perfect match. I’m usually some shade of “neutral” light to medium and this was perfect like it was made for my skin. The finish is sheer. I did two pumps to fully cover. No smell, not greasy. Didn’t clog my pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely luminous, it gives me that gentle glow when I wear this. My face feels super smooth when I wear this foundation and even when I take it off as well. My face has never felt like it does when I wear this foundation. I have always struggled to find a foundation that fit me and made me feel better about my skin but this one is it for me. Definitely lasts all day for me as a teacher and a coach after school. I recommend this, really worth a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation truly enhances your natural skin! It’s incredibly lightweight and feels like you’re wearing nothing at all. The shade range is fantastic and the quality matches the price perfectly. It has great staying power for office work days. Definitely worth every penny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Considering it’s Fenty, I was expecting it to match closely and it did! I like that it’s lightweight and has a smooth finish. I barely wear foundation anymore as it’s just too heavy for my skin, but this one seems like something that I could actually wear daily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great makeup. I love Fenty they are an awesome brand and the products are 10/10. I did get this in a shade too dark for my natural skin tone but still loved it and was able to use when i was a bit more tan.  Finish is beautiful and looks so natural. Fenty beauty is stepping up their game with these products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is your skin but better! It is super lightweight and you can’t feel it on your face. The shade selection is awesome and the price range reflects the quality. This is so worth the money!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new go to foundation. I love the finish and coverage for every day and nights out. The packaging makes it seem so fancy. There’s no irritating fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Nice quality foundation. It is very creamy and smoothing on the skin. I did notice a light scent, I personally do not like scented beauty products as I have sensitive skin and asthma. It was not an overwhelming scent but kind of a deal breaker for me. Others with less sensitivity may enjoy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Packaging is really cute. Matte glass bottle. Shade matched and blends flawlessly. Lightweight formula. Because of that this foundation is light to medium coverage only. To me it’s perfect because I need something for everyday use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice buildable coverage, feels smooth on the skin, not sure about Shade Range as i could not find a Shade that was a match for me, light to no scent and very beautiful packaging

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty much flawless skin! Looking really hydrated and healthy without a shiney glow really lays down so nicely! I really love this foundation! This is so skin like it feels like you’re not wearing nothing. It definitely leaves a flawless finish. It’s perfect for taking photos.!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Coverage awesome scent great package nothing extravagant but the blendability its great the finish its natural thats what i like most nothing oily nothing dry just in the middle

reviews.review_title: A glowy base without too heavy a shine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation hits the mark on everything I prefer in foundations, including letting some glow remain rather than being a fully matte formulation. I'm a believer that a matte base ages you. It applies well without any notable oxidation and it stayed out for well over 10 hours. I have a habit of resting my chin on my palm at the desk in work, and this did not cause the foundation to slide or transfer, so extra points for that. I have not tested out the waterproof qualities of this foundation, although I had checked before and noticed on my swatch the tell-tale water droplet beading when I ran water over the swatch. It is a tad bit too yellow for me (I'm a neutral-cool olive) but I will be seeing if they have a closer match because I really enjoyed trialing this formula. This is my honest review in exchange for this being gifted to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely not my color but I really wanted to try out this product cause I’ve heard a lot of good things. I used this as a contour. It has great coverage and very light weight. Feels like silk. Definitely going to buy in my shade as a foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Although this isn’t my shade, it worked wonderfully as a contour shade for me! It’s really silky smooth and blends so well. I love Fenty products in general and I really can’t wait to find my actual shade in this foundation. It really is a great formula!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is beautiful! I got the wrong shade but I made it work. This is full coverage and long lasting. I have it on one side of my face not prepped or finished, just bare to see accuracy of color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m pleasantly surprised by how much I like this foundation. It’s a thin, soft matte foundation with a very subtle glow. not the best shade match for me- a little bit too yellow in undertone, but most foundations have that issue for me. For dry skin, I really haven’t experienced any issues as long as I have good skin prep. It leaves a nice finish on my skin, almost velvet and “my skin but better”. Overall, I really do like this foundation and I’ll use it well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a makeup and skincare fanatic . Nice luminous foundation, doesn't look cakey, doesn't crease, long lasting, excellent shade match! it looks and feels like my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The finish is amazing as well as the coverage. I love the packaging, it’s light and easy to use. The brush is  a phenomenal touch. The ingredients are very well thought and the scent is non existent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best foundation I have ever tried, in 20 years. I have tried countless foundations and I am always on the hunt for my perfect foundation and this is it! At the moment I am having a perioral dermatits flare up which causes redness and extremely dehydrated skin around the mouth and nose. Typically even my skincare and other glowy foundations will not be able to hold up throughout the day without feeling tight and irritated around the mouth and have some redness still peaking through. Definitely don't be like me and try and wear makeup if you PD. But with all the claims I still wanted to try this out and I am so glad I did!! So anyone saying this isn't safe for sensitive skin or it doesn't last throughout the day didn't prep and set this properly for their skin type. I have combo skin, that is very oily in the t zone and normal to dehydrated everywhere else depending on the time of month. There is zero fragrance, even with my dehydrated skin it didn't settle into fine lines or crease.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I now get the fenty hype. When fenty first launched, the foundation did not work and I have not purchased it since then. I was a bit hesitant I try this but the finish is flawless, blends smoothly and coverage is amazing. I don’t even fell like I have to use a color corrector with this foundation. The pump makes it very easy to control how much foundation you are using. This foundation is it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: the foundation isn't great if you have drier skin it really highlights that and doesn't dry down very well. It looks slightly patchy and highlights your pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was matched to perfection and I love it. I used to resist the fact that I have a peach undertone and this is it. Fenty ain’t playing! any foundation that stands, survives and stays alive in scorching hot weather deserves a spot in my top list.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the Soft'Lit Naturally Luminous Longwear Foundation in Shade 450, and I'm impressed! The shade blends seamlessly into my skin, offering full coverage without feeling heavy. The luminous finish gives my complexion a natural glow, making it perfect for both everyday wear and special occasions. It lasts all day without caking or settling into fine lines, even in humid weather. I also appreciate that it doesn’t oxidize or change color throughout the day. Overall, it’s a fantastic foundation for those looking for a balance of coverage, luminosity, and long wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage was very nice, but only sheer light to medium. The finish was not matte, but not too dewy as well. Just like your skin but better. Scent wasn’t anything noticeable. The packing is beautiful and fits in your hand nice. Blendability was nice as its sheer coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I personally really loved this foundation by Fenty Beauty as I usually do with their products. The coverage is perfect for me and covers my dark circles. The texture is smooth and moisturizing. The finish is a glowy matte and to me I didn’t notice a noticeable scent but it definitely didn’t smell bad. I always adore her matte packaging and it’s always super chic! This is also the most perfect match I have found for my pale skin tone and I’m in love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage is insane! Little goes along way. I Actually ended up using this foundation as a contour instead, because I accidentally clicked on the wrong shade. I only needed half a pump just a contour my whole face. Even though it was a darker shade, It was so easy to blend and manage. There's no smell. This works so well with my skin, I'm actually dying to buy it in my shade.
This is my new favorite foundation! I found it pretty moisturizing for my dry skin and it blended in so well. It is definitely light coverage but buildable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This left a nice coverage. It didn’t feel dry at all. I used a sponge to blend it and it blended very easily. It left my skin with a luminous glow and looking good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got number 185 and I used it for almost 3 weeks before writing the review (sorry, don’t feel comfortable to post pictures of my face) and so far I‘m satisfied! It didn’t cause any break outs, the coverage is light but I actually prefer it this way. I usually applied it before my 8h work shift and it lasted me through the day ! I want to try another shade now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am surprised with this foundation. The formula is light but has very good coverage, it doesn't feel heavy. It blends very easily with the skin and leaves a beautiful finish. It has no smell and lasts all day. The packaging is very nice. I really recommend it for daily use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fenty beauty foundation keeps my face natural looking,  and my skin looks flawless. It lasted for several hours, and the foundation applied smoothly on my face.  The shade blends well with my skin as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was an absolute perfect gift. My friend loves the consistency and I can’t wait to get my own shade. She said that it’s soft but light weight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The shade I chose matched my skin perfectly! I really like that it has a satin finish which worked well on my dryer skin. It doesn’t feel heavy on your face and it lasted me all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go to brand when it comes to foundation. The color matching is always spot on. It blends into my skin so naturally. It truly looks like my skin just better. You dont need much but this is buildable. Great for all ages. Love love

Love how it brightens my skin over time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So they didn’t have my foundation shade but I love using foundation for contour and this is the perfect contour shade it blends nicely I do wish I was able to try my actual shade but it works

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was medium to full coverage on me. I love how well it blends into my skin. There was not a scent to this product. This came in a thin glass tube with a pump nozzle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Soft'Lit foundation has to be one of my most favorites I've tried this year! A little goes a long way with this product.  I can say that this product does work for dry skin. Even without my primer it still worked and made my skin look flawless. My nose area is where I have most of my problems when applying foundation. But with this foundation I had no problems. I love thats it's glowy and has amazing coverage. I like the packaging alot and the glass bottle I think is a great touch to it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin

I think this would be ideal for combo to dry skin types!

reviews.review_title: Great for deep dark skin tones and dry skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

The sweat and humidity-resistant formula makes it a great option for all day wear! I just use a dab for bronzing and  it works like a charm in creating a luminous and long-lasting glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A little really goes a loooong way. I think the coverage felt a little too thick without being buildable. It also really did not last all day like I hoped.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I found Fenty Beauty Soft Lit Naturally Luminous Long Wear Foundation to be very impressive. It is lightweight with silky texture. It provides medium coverage that’s easily buildable. It offers a natural, luminous look that’s not heavy or cakey, making it perfect for those who love a fresh, everyday glow.   The foundation's lightweight feel also makes it comfortable for all-day wear. It was not piling or making me look greasy or drying. If you’re after a foundation that looks like skin but better, this one is a solid choice!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fenty Beauty by Rihanna's Soft'Lit Naturally Luminous Longwear Foundation in Shade 260 is a game-changer for those seeking a natural, radiant finish with long-lasting wear. The formula feels lightweight yet provides excellent medium coverage, blurring imperfections while keeping skin looking fresh and dewy throughout the day. Shade 260 is ideal for medium skin tones with neutral undertones, blending seamlessly without oxidizing. Its hydrating properties make it perfect for all-day comfort, even on dry skin. Plus, it's buildable, allowing for a flawless, customizable finish that enhances your natural glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using the Fenty Beauty Soft’Lit Naturally Luminous Longwear Foundation in Shade 170, I found it gives a beautiful, natural glow. It offers buildable coverage and blends well with medium skin tones. The formula feels light and stays fresh throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: GORGEOUS! Loved the coverage and finish of this foundation, it was perfect for a wedding weekend and I actually looked forward to applying it because it felt so light on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin

reviews.review_title: Your most natural lightweight foundation all day
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Soft’Lit Naturally Luminous Shade 210 makeup with a light layer of foundation is still one of the beauty trends that always strengthens its favorite position in the hearts of Asian women, especially office girls. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin

The scent has nothing special but not bad or strong so it is fine, and the dispenser is great that way it does not stains around!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this foundation free from Influenster in exchange for my honest review. This foundation is beautiful and has a smooth, radiant, and natural finish. Blends into my skin so easily and has a very wide range of colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There was a slight learning curve on how to get the most out of this foundation. I have found that using a brush and slightly less product than I normally use leads to the best amount of coverage without looking cakey or settling into drier areas. I did see issues with caking and settling if I used my fingers as I feel the product just does not blend out well with fingers. With a foundation brush though, this product is absolutely stunning on the skin. It gives a beautiful, luminous glow without looking greasy and gives a nice medium-coverage while looking natural on the skin. The shade match of this foundation is the best I have ever had on any face product and that alone will most likely make me repurchase. Overall, the product can be a bit finicky at first and might also be breaking me out a little bit, but I am highly tempted to make this a staple in my makeup routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The fenty beauty soft’lit naturally luminous longwear foundation gives a natural finish look and doesn’t feel cakey. It was super easy to apply considering the pump applicator, and was also easy to blend into the skin. It is medium coverage and you definitely don’t need a lot of product to cover your face. One of my favorite features is the glass bottle it comes in. I received color 385 which is extremely too dark for my skin but it’s good to use a tiny bit with your moisturizer as that glowy sun kissed tan. It kind of smells like clay but not in a terrible way. I definitely recommend this product.

The coverage is WOW! I have some acne scars and it covers it up so well, no need for concealer. Love the pump. My skin is combo and this foundation leaves my skin with a natural finish but glowing. My new fav foundation!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation! I can’t get over how beautifully this covered and went on so smooth! It was a beautiful Dewey finish and I will definitely be buying this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Although it wasn't the best match it overall was a great foundation. Definitely lasted all day. Natural finished. Didn't leave face feeling dried or caked. Medium coverage so face felt light during these hot temps. Great packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was So excited about trying this product because once I seen Luminous I knew This foundation would be everything , I love The coverage and how buildable it is , also love it’s not drying to my skin at all or makes me look ashy which I love Truly !

reviews.review_title: Definitely I am in love with this foundation.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm obsessed with this foundation! The color match is spot on for my skin tone, and it gives amazing coverage without feeling greasy or heavy. I highly recommend it to anyone who hates heavy foundations like me! I received this foundation for free from Influenster and Fenty Beauty in exhchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Whoa! This foundation is so good! I have hyperpigmentation, and it provides me with great coverage. It's very lightweight and provides you with a natural look. It definitely is waterproof as well. The packaging is also very pretty!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this foundation. However it didn’t give me any glow. It dried down like chalk. It settled into fine lines and did not have any staying power. I was very disappointed. It was my first and only returned product at Sephora to date.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very lightweight and smooth on my face. It gives a nice finish even though it's a light touch. IT lasts all day from morning to nice and nice coverage also.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product, complementary from influencer for testing purposes in exchange for my honest opinion and review. I gave this to my wife to test so this is her review. I have dry skin so I thought that this was a great formula. The color mattress was not exact. I could use this, but I need to use a lot of concealer to lighten up other areas of my face. It is very blend, but it is just a little pink for my skin tone. ￼ it might work more for me in the ￼summertime. ￼

The coverage of this foundation is perfect & buildable and covers all my flaws but doesn’t make me feel caked faced. The finish did not need setting powder and also not super matte or leaving an oily finish, which I loved. The foundation smells really good while applying it, packaging was really nice & the shade range is insanely good. Fenty popped off with this foundation. I have tried Estée Lauder, Mac, & lately I have been buying Rare Beauty buttttt im definitely going to buy this again once I finish it! I really really liked it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m not normally a foundation wearer but I was excited to try this one out and I was pleasantly surprised. I was worried that because it’s a luminous foundation it would appear oily on my skin but that was not the case. It lays really well on my skin and has buildable coverage. Overall the foundation is lightweight and doesn’t have any strong scent or fragrance which I also like. ￼

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Influenster They didn’t give me much shades to choose from so I opted to getting a dark shade cause I really wanted to try it so I thought I’ll mix it with my lighter foundations to create a perfect tone for me and it worked out perfectly this foundation is definitely more of a medium coverage but buildable it’s not matte it has a very nice luminous glow to it which gives the skin a nice glow making it look  like it’s glowing from within the packaging is nice it came in a glass bottle which is good to recycle love that I’m gonna look into getting my perfect shade since I really like how it looks on

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage of the applied to area awesome finish no sticky feeling leftover residue simple scent nice cute packaging compatabilty was a little off but after blending for a bit longer it was perfect

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a long-time fan of Fenty, I’m thrilled with how this foundation delivers a stunning, golden-hour glow without feeling greasy. It hydrates and brightens my complexion, leaving it looking fresh and even all day. The medium coverage is just right, and it stays put without any shine. It’s like a glow-up in a bottle—perfect for achieving that radiant, dewy look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this foundation. Although it is a bit too pink on me I made it work with concealer. It is not too heavy and it covers my face exactly how I want it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What’s there to say about fenty foundation that has not already been said? I use it as foundation, I use it as contour, I use it for all my skin needs. It’s slightly luminous and blends perfectly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color match on this product is as advertised. It’s so light weight and and makes my skin feel flawless! It pinky takes a very small amount to cover the entire face and the quality is amazing! Seems pricey but considering the fact you only need a little for full coverage, it’s a great value.

reviews.review_title: A Perfect, Radiant Match for Medium to Deep Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Fenty Beauty Soft'Lit Foundation in Shade 420 is perfect for my medium to deep skin tone. It’s lightweight, buildable, and gives a natural, radiant finish that lasts all day without feeling heavy or clogging pores. A go-to for a flawless, luminous look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, the packaging is beautiful and makes this feel like a really luxe product. Foundation comes out of a pump and isn’t too runny. A little bit does seem to go a long way — I went a bit too heavy handed at first. I was afraid it didn’t match my skin tone, but it seems to be a decent match for my neck which means it will likely even out my face to match. It felt really yellow at first because I have a bit of a rosy complexion. So it does seem to be a true neutral shade. Definitely make sure to prime your face before applying this foundation because it did seem to cling a little to my dry spots. Overall, a great foundation! Thank you to Influenster and Fenty Beauty for sending me this foundation in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my honest review. I have pretty skin so I’m very picky about my foundations, but I love this foundation so much. It provided a great amount of coverage but still looked natural and was my perfect shade match.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love it! The texture is smooth and not that dry. It stays on my skin perfectly and it is indeed long lasting. It has that natural glow finish and look great

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my very first time using FENTY BEAUTY product and I’m impressed. I love the package!!! It giving high luxury quality. The foundation is creamy and lightweight with buildable coverage. It is on a dewy side if it is not be setting with powder. 10/10 would totally buy other fenty products in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It has nice a finish, no fragrance, goes on smoothly with blender & brush. It did not cover all the pigmentation and problems spots, so I would say it is not full coverage. It is light wearing. It does come with a pump which is nice.. I am using it for few days now, I want to see how long it lasts me & I will update on usage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a light coverage foundation that goes on with a smooth finish. It has a very light pleasant scent that is hardly noticeable. I love the packaging and dispenser. I will say that I have sensitive skin and it did make my face a bit irritated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful foundation! Nice dewy finish with great coverage. Good shade range. Nice simple packing with a matte finish. Overall I really like it.
This foundation is so flawless. I love all things fenty but this has such a natural and beautiful finish. It goes on like silk with a beautiful coverage and was my perfect match

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation has been a go to for me lately, I used to struggle keeping my foundation on all day in the heat of Florida, So I wanted something long lasting but non drying, this is it.. definitely a Waterproof foundation that hydrates your skin while it stays in place. It is just amazing. I love the bottle is so beautiful and elegant. I love the luminous effect without adding shine to my T zone. Definitely a must have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! It’s been difficult finding a foundation that matches my skin tone, and this one matches to pefctly! It has great coverage as well, can't wait to use it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I think I went 1 shade to light but it will be good in the winter, over all it’s light weight, the finish is like matte, but the packaging was weird I went to open it and it twisted and spilled all over lol so be careful but the foundation it self is nice and I recommend it. Also I think it’s light than the model cause I would say I’m about the models shade rn or lighter but this  the lighter than me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this foundation as part of a campaign and I cannot say enough good things about it. From the crazy easy blendability with both a makeup sponge and a brush to the perfect glowy finish I will always grab this product first. I put this on for a backyard party in the Sun on an 80° day and it lasted hours until I got home and washed it off. I also love the packaging and the aesthetic of the component. The pump makes it easy to get the product out and does not over-disperse. Will absolutely be something I purchase again and again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the fenty beauty brand. It’s luxurious and affordable. High quality products that work well and leave your skin feeling amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this foundation, but it didn’t meet my expectations. The coverage is not great and the foundation doesn’t cover my imperfections neither reduces the appearance of my pores. It’s easy to blend, the color is accurate, but that’s it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product with great coverage. I love how easy it is to blend and the way it makes my skin look. I also love the packaging and the beautiful bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The soft'lit long-term fundation is light weight, covers blemishes, matched perfectly with my skin tone. Blended easily, and I was able to apply my other products like blush without a problem. Fenty beauty did a fenomenal job with this foundation. I even loved the packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The most luscious luminous foundation. Their shade match is unreal and this dries down to a nice natural finish. I love it and its buildable coverage

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free for my honest review.  Usually I’m a matte girl but I definitely like this formula more and it blends REALLY WELL with my skin tone and doesn’t oxidize with an orange undertone. The packaging is nice and I like how it is still in the glass Fenty shape. I would recommend using this  either as full coverage or just for spot treatments.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my second time receiving this item for review and I picked a different shade and it’s still way too orange so I’m just convinced that it’s the brand that doesn’t provide good Dark shades which is very disappointing..I was not able to test this foundation because I selected the wrong foundation shade. This shade is very orange, I’m not sure who would be this orange.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The real best foundation to own is is Fenty Beauty Soft’ Lit Naturally Luminous Foundation. I received in shade no.170.  It has all good things into it, adding magic to your face. It has thin texture, absorbs easily into skin, high and even coverage, doesn’t oxidise, no oily skin post use, and most importantly long lasting foundation. The Fenty Beauty never leaves you disappointed. Thank you so much for the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation. The coverage is nice and the color match is spot on. Very easy to apply and does not feel heavy. Gives my skin a glow and looks very natural. The pump is easy to use and the slim foundation packaging allows it to be easily carried around

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you Influenster for sending this to me to test out and review! I’m so glad I also was send a foundation that matches me! This feels like a light foundation, doesn’t feel heavy at all, but it seems the be a buildable coverage. The finish is as the name, luminous. You don’t really need a highlighter when using this product. I also appreciate that this doesn’t irritate my sensitive, eczema prone skin. Definitely going to continue to use this!

reviews.review_title: Rihanna did so good on this one!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s hard not to love this foundation. It is very blendable with anything. Canmt smell any scent. It lasts a good amount of time, not all day for me tho. It makes my skin look beautifully layered. Looks natural. Covered imperfections good (textures and pores). It’s not hydrating to the point that dry skin people can use it. I would say it’s better for combination skin type like me. I think oily can still use it but depends on how oily. Sweet spot is combination. It did settle on the side lines of my nose but that always happens with most foundations on me so no big deal. Doesn’t feel heavy and not too glowy too. It does oxidize do don’t worry if you are one shade lighter wrong.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m typically not a fan of foundation as it sticks to my skin and makes me look cakey. I really enjoy how luminous and natural-looking this foundation is, it doesn’t feel heavy on the skin and a little goes a long way. I enjoy the feeling of this on my skin and it doesn’t break me out or irritate my skin in any way. I would recommend this to anyone who likes the my skin but better make up approach.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My first Fenty foundation and I am loving this! It is true to color, which means it doesn’t oxidize. It is luminous but not shiny, which I love for my combination skin.  It doesn’t cling to any of my dry patches. It has buildable coverage. I have rosacea and this covers all my redness. Definitely will be buying more once I ran out. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love the product but it wasn't for me. The shade was a little to light for my liking, and it didn't sit right on my textured skin. There was also an ingredient that I probably was a little allergic to or irritated by as a sensitive skin person. It was however very hydrating and full coverage. It was easy to blend and made ones skin look hydrated, like healthy looking skin. I would definitely reccomend this product if you have dry skin and don't have much texture.   *I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One thing I love about this foundation is that a little goes a long way and it’s unscented. With that being said I have tried different types of the fenty foundation and for some reason it always accentuates my pores and skin texture. Not sure if i need to test it with different primers but this isn’t a favorite of mine. If you have oily to normal skin then I can see this working.   *I received this product from influenster and brand in exchange for my honest review.
